title: Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12", Locking Metal Food Tongs Non-Slip Grip
descriptions:
Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs, Set of 2 (9" and 12")

Simple, safe, and easy to use. This handy set gives you two tongs: a shorter 9-inch tong for kitchen tasks and a longer 12-inch tong for grilling or reaching into deeper pots. Both are light in the hand but strong enough for daily use.

Why you’ll like them:
- Easy to hold: Soft, cushioned silicone handles are gentle on your hands and won’t slip.
- Safe edges: Smooth design helps protect your fingers from accidental nicks.
- Heat ready: Stainless steel heads stand up to heat for cooking and grilling.
- Simple open/close: Pull the little ring to lock them closed. Push it to open. That’s it.
- Easy to store: Hang them by the loop or lock them and tuck them in a drawer to save space.
- Easy to clean: Pop them in the dishwasher. They come out looking like new.

What they’re good for:
- Turning burgers, chicken, or fish
- Serving salad or pasta
- Lifting roast meats
- Grilling outdoors or cooking indoors

Built to last: Rust-resistant, sturdy stainless steel that resists wear and tear.

If you want kitchen tools that are comfortable, dependable, and simple to use, these Hotec tongs are a smart choice. Two sizes, one easy routine: pull to lock, push to cook.
